question: The Cheif Minister of Uttar Pradesh Yogi Adityanath has decided to rename this railway station after RSS ideologue Deen Dayal Upadhyay.
explanation: The cheif minister of Uttar Pradesh Yogi Adityanath cabinet has decided to rename Mughalsarai railway station near Varanasi after RSS ideologue Pandit Deendayal Upadhyaya. Upadhyay had died under mysterious circumstances while travelling in a train at Mughalsarai station on February 11, 1968. Mughalsarai is one of the busiest stations of the Eastern Railway.
